title: Patchwork Panel, ca. 1910
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: roller printed on supplementary weft pile (velveteen), stitching
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Stephen Smith
description: Patchwork panel made of 130 rectangles printed to look like Persian carpets. At least twenty-nine different pattern are present and several have different colorways. On each rectangle, printed on the back is: "Factory No. 649, 1st District N.Y.," or "Factory No. 33, 2nd District N.Y."

tombstone.epitaph:
Patchwork Panel, ca. 1910.
ca. 1910. Medium: cotton
Technique: roller printed on supplementary weft pile (velveteen), stitching. Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Stephen Smith. 1980-31-5.
